com.example.hotpot0.models

Class EventUserLinkDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hotpot0.models.EventUserLinkDB

  • public class EventUserLinkDB
extends java.lang.Object
    EventUserLinkDB handles all Firestore operations for EventUserLink. It can add, delete, update, and fetch EventUserLink data.

    It also provides helper functions to retrieve all users currently on a waitlist for a given event based on their linkIDs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  EventUserLinkDB.ActionCallback
      Callback interface for Firestore operations that perform an action without returning specific data, like update or delete.
      static interface  EventUserLinkDB.GetCallback<T>
      Callback interface for Firestore operations that return data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventUserLinkDB()
      Initializes a new EventUserLinkDB and connects to Firestore.

    • Method Detail

      • addEventUserLink

        public void addEventUserLink(EventUserLink eventUserLink,
                             EventUserLinkDB.GetCallback<EventUserLink> callback)
        Adds a new EventUserLink and returns the created EventUserLink on success. This method creates and retrieves the new EventUserLink in one step.
        Parameters:
        eventUserLink - The EventUserLink object to be added (without linkID)
        callback - Callback that returns the created EventUserLink

      • updateEventUserLink

        public void updateEventUserLink(EventUserLink eventUserLink,
                                EventUserLinkDB.ActionCallback callback)
        Updates an existing EventUserLink in Firestore. Only updates status and notifications fields.
        Parameters:
        eventUserLink - The EventUserLink object with updated values (must have linkID)
        callback - Callback to notify success or failure

      • deleteEventUserLink

        public void deleteEventUserLink(java.lang.String linkID,
                                EventUserLinkDB.ActionCallback callback)
        Deletes an EventUserLink by linkID.
        Parameters:
        linkID - The ID of the EventUserLink to delete
        callback - Callback to notify success or failure

      • getEventUserLinkByID

        public void getEventUserLinkByID(java.lang.String linkID,
                                 EventUserLinkDB.GetCallback<EventUserLink> callback)
        Fetches an EventUserLink by linkID.
        Parameters:
        linkID - The ID of the EventUserLink to fetch
        callback - Callback to return the EventUserLink or an error

      • getWaitListUsers

        public void getWaitListUsers(java.util.List<java.lang.String> linkIDs,
                             EventUserLinkDB.GetCallback<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> callback)
        Retrieves all user link IDs currently marked as "inWaitList" from a given list of linkIDs.

        For each provided link ID, this method asynchronously fetches the corresponding EventUserLink document and checks if its status equals "inWaitList". Once all requests are complete, the callback is invoked with the filtered list.

        Parameters:
        linkIDs - list of linkIDs to check
        callback - callback returning the list of link IDs currently in the waitlist
